div.p: A set of codes that describe how a provider is affiliated with an organization pertaining to the practice of medicine.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/practitioner-hspc-practiceAffiliationType defines the following codes:

tr.td: The provider's connection with the organization as a practitioner is in an educaitonal manner, i.e. as an educator or student.

description.value: A set of codes that describe how a provider is affiliated with an organization pertaining to the practice of medicine.

definition.value: The provider's connection with the organization as a practitioner is in an educaitonal manner, i.e. as an educator or student.
